name: Brute Coalitions
background: The Gangs of New Eden are various factions of violent and deranged outlaws that wage eternal gang wars on the streets of New Eden. These gangs are joined by mercenaries which are not bound to any particular gang, and which fight for anyone that can provide riches or a worthy cause.

spells.name: Psychic Feast
spells.effect: Pick up to two friendly units within 12", which get Resistance once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: { name: params.effect.unitRule.name, rating: params.effect.unitRule.rating, multiplier: params.multiplier * (params.aura ? this.AuraSize : 1), avgUnit: !params.thisUnit }

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Devour Essence
spells.effect: Pick one enemy model within 18", which takes 2 hits with AP(1).

spells.name: Brute Guts
spells.effect: Pick up to four friendly units within 12", which get Fearless once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.effect: Pick up to two enemy units within 12", which take 2 hits with AP(1) and Slam each.

spells.effect: Pick up to six enemy units within 18", which get Unwieldy in melee once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration

spells.name: Great Psy-Maw
spells.effect: Pick up to three enemy units within 12", which take 2 hits with AP(2) each.

specialRules.name: Repel Ambushers
specialRules.description: Enemy units using Ambush must be set up over 12" away from this model's unit.

specialRules.name: Shielded
specialRules.description: Units where all models have this rule get +1 to defense rolls against hits that are not from spells.

specialRules.name: Slam
specialRules.description: Ignores Cover, and on unmodified results of 1 to block hits, this weapon deals 1 extra wound.

specialRules.name: Brute Courage
specialRules.description: If a unit where all models have this rule is Shaken at the beginning of the round, roll one die. On a 4+, it stops being Shaken.

specialRules.name: Versatile Defense Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Versatile Defense. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Unpredictable Fighter Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Unpredictable Fighter. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Scout Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Scout. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Fortified Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Fortified. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Fearless Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Fearless. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Unwieldy Debuff
specialRules.description: Once per activation, before attacking, pick up to 4 enemy units within 18", which gets Unwieldy in melee once (next time the effect would apply).

specialRules.name: Unstoppable when Shooting Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Unstoppable when shooting. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Ambush
specialRules.description: May be set aside before deployment. At the start of any round after the first, may be deployed anywhere over 9 away from enemy units. Players alternate in placing Ambush units, starting with the player that activates next. Units that deploy via Ambush cant seize or contest objectives on the round they deploy.

specialRules.name: Ignores Cover
specialRules.description: This weapon ignores cover.

specialRules.name: Versatile Defense
specialRules.description: When a unit where all models have this rule is deployed or activated, pick one effect: when shot or charged from over 9" away, the unit either gets +1 to defense rolls, or enemy units get -1 to hit rolls against it. This effect lasts until the units' next activation.

specialRules.name: Defense
specialRules.description: This model gets +X to defense rolls.

specialRules.name: Unpredictable Fighter
specialRules.description: When in melee, roll one die and apply one effect to all models with this rule: on a 1-3 they get AP(+1), and on a 4-6 they get +1 to hit rolls instead.

specialRules.name: Unpredictable
specialRules.description: When attacking, roll one die and apply one effect to all models with this rule: on a 1-3 they get AP(+1), and on a 4-6 they get +1 to hit rolls instead.

specialRules.name: Scout
specialRules.description: May be set aside before deployment. After all other units are deployed, may be deployed anywhere fully within 12 of their deployment zone. Players alternate in placing Scout units, starting with the player that activates next.

specialRules.name: Fortified
specialRules.description: When units where all models have this rule take hits, those hits count as having AP(-1), to a min. of AP(0).

specialRules.name: Fearless
specialRules.description: When a unit where all models have this rule fails a morale test, roll one die. On a 4+ it counts as passed instead.

specialRules.name: Fear
specialRules.description: This model counts as having dealt +X wounds when checking wound effects in melee (must deal at least one wound).

specialRules.name: Unwieldy
specialRules.description: Strikes last when charging.

specialRules.name: Unstoppable
specialRules.description: Ignores Regeneration, and ignores all negative modifiers to this weapon.

specialRules.name: AP
specialRules.description: Targets get -X to Defense rolls when blocking hits.

specialRules.name: Resistance
specialRules.description: When a unit where all models have this rule takes wounds, roll one die for each. On a 6+ it is ignored. If the wounds were from a spell, then they are ignored on a 2+ instead.
